title: File Storage Download Performance Degradation
description: Users experiencing slow download speeds from file storage service. Average response time increased from 150ms to 450ms.

updates.message: Identified high load on storage nodes. Scaling up capacity.
updates.author: DevOps Engineer

title: Elevated Error Rate on Search API
description: Search API returning 5xx errors at 0.5% rate, above normal threshold of 0.1%.

updates.message: Reviewing Elasticsearch cluster health. No obvious issues found yet.
updates.author: Backend Engineer

title: Database Connection Pool Exhaustion
description: Database connection pool reached maximum capacity causing temporary service disruptions.

updates.message: Incident resolved. Connection pool size increased from 100 to 200. Monitoring for stability.
updates.author: Database Administrator

updates.message: Temporary fix applied. Killing idle connections and increasing pool size.
updates.author: Database Administrator

updates.message: Root cause identified: Sudden spike in concurrent users exceeded pool capacity.
updates.author: Site Reliability Engineer

title: Email Delivery Delays
description: Email notifications experiencing 5-10 minute delays in delivery.

updates.message: Issue resolved. Queue processing returned to normal after clearing backlog.
updates.author: Platform Engineer

updates.message: Email queue backlog identified. Scaling up workers to process faster.
updates.author: Platform Engineer

title: Payment Gateway Timeout Issues
description: Intermittent timeout errors when processing payments through Razorpay integration.

updates.message: Confirmed with Razorpay that issue was on their end. Now resolved.
updates.author: Finance Tech Lead

updates.message: Implemented retry logic and increased timeout threshold as temporary mitigation.
updates.author: Backend Engineer

updates.message: Investigating. Appears to be external API issue with Razorpay.
updates.author: Finance Tech Lead

title: Cache Eviction Rate Spike
description: Redis cache experiencing unusually high eviction rate, impacting performance.

updates.message: Memory increased and eviction policy optimized. Cache performance restored.
updates.author: DevOps Engineer

updates.message: Root cause: Memory limit reached due to increased data volume. Scaling up Redis instance.
updates.author: DevOps Engineer

title: Scheduled Maintenance - Database Upgrade
description: Planned maintenance window for PostgreSQL version upgrade from 15.1 to 15.2.

updates.message: Maintenance completed successfully. All services operational.
updates.author: Database Administrator

updates.message: Upgrade in progress. Replica upgraded, now upgrading primary.
updates.author: Database Administrator

updates.message: Maintenance window started. Beginning database upgrade process.
updates.author: Database Administrator
